subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Portugal eliminated the United States yesterday, 6-5, and clinched a spot in the quarterfinals of the 16-team Beach Soccer World Cup in Rio de Janeiro.Portugal advanced from Group B; Spain was the group winner despite a 5-4 loss to Iran. The top two teams in each of the four groups advance.Brazil, the defending champion, defeated Russia, 5-4, on penalties to remain unbeaten and win Group A.Mexico, a 6-3 winner over the Solomon Islands, also advanced, as did Nigeria and Senegal. Italy, Uruguay, Japan, Argentina and France are vying for the last two spots.
